nodes.text: The Feswe Minor system was a star system located within the Gordian Reach of the Outer Rim Territories.

Feswe Minor was a lifeless system on the route between the Feswe Corridor and Feriae Junction, a stopping point for Rebel ships running the Blockade of Yavin. The Empire cut off this route during the Rebels' attempt to evacuate Yavin 4.
